item.title: Life
item.description: Sometimes life can just suck - like today is Halloween for me. I’d gone out trick-or-treating with my friends.

item.title: My First Blog!
item.description: I created this website for pure fun. I saw a lot of people making websites, so I was really motivated to make mine.

item.title: What's so fun about Maths?
item.description: Now granted, there are some parts of math that.. aren’t that fun. Geometry, angles, SOHCAHTOA.. they’re boring for me.
